checks.label: Duplicate payment verification
checks.detail: 15452 high-confidence groups (£93.6M). Duplicate ratio: 2.1%. Filtered out: 3149 batch payments, 22403 CSV overlaps.

checks.label: Split payment analysis
checks.detail: 439 suspect instances (£433.6M, 12.0% of spend). Threshold: 5+ payments to same supplier in same week, 80%+ of approval limit.

checks.label: Year-end spike verification
checks.detail: Highest spike: 14.7x in Corporate Accounting General (BS). Year-end spikes are common in public sector (capital programmes, grants). Only extreme spikes (>3x) warrant concern.

checks.label: CH compliance — pre-breach only
checks.detail: 13 suppliers have current breaches, but all payments were made before breaches started. Not violations at time of payment.

checks.label: Benford's Law forensic screening
checks.detail: Significant deviation from Benford's Law (p < 0.001). χ²=8141.03 on 584710 amounts >£100. Largest deviation: digit 3 (3.1% off expected).

warnings: CRITICAL: Only 0.0% of transactions have descriptions. This severely limits analysis quality.

Benford's Law analysis shows significant deviation (χ²=8141.03). Digit 3 deviates 3.1% from expected. This warrants investigation but can also occur with legitimate round-number grants or threshold-based payments.
